overview: Doug Walker has spent the last 25 years serving in a wide array of leadership roles with some of the most innovative companies in technology, including Silicon Graphics, Sun Microsystems, Prime Computer and IBM. Prior to joining BitTorrent, Doug spent 6 years as President and CEO of Alias Systems, the worldâ€™s premier provider of 3-D software technology serving the entertainment and product design industries. Alias (now owned by Autodesk) operated in over 50 countries and served a customer base that included global leaders such as Disney, Dreamworks, Pixar, Electronic Arts, Sony, Apple and every automotive company in the world. Doug grew up in Toronto, Canada and is a graduate of Ryerson University in Business Administration.
